item.title: IBRX
item.description: score:697 Chances: ImmunityBio’s resubmission of its Biologics License Application for N-803 has been accepted for review by the FDA, indicating potential for approval of a promising treatment for bladder cancer. New data shows that ImmunityBio’s Memory Cytokine-Enriched Natural Killer cells may provide benefit to patients with small cell lung cancer and other types of neuroendocrine tumors, offering a positive outlook for the company’s therapies.
